About the Company: Powerhouse Fitness and Realty Ltd. owns and operates chain of fitness center. It offers its services under the brand name power house. Its services include gyms, steam, aerobics and diet counseling. The company was founded in 1975 and is based in Mumbai, Maharashtra.
